main_definition: Improving the quality, value, or attractiveness of something by making it better.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To increase in strength or effectiveness
meanings_and_examples.example: He was enhancing his workout routine to achieve faster results.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To improve the appearance, value, or functionality of something
meanings_and_examples.example: She was enhancing her resume with additional certifications and skills.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To add extra ingredients to a dish for better flavor
meanings_and_examples.example: The chef was enhancing the soup by adding fresh herbs and spices.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To improve one's abilities or skills through practice or learning
meanings_and_examples.example: He has been enhancing his language skills by taking classes every weekend.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To make something more appealing to others, such as in marketing
meanings_and_examples.example: The company was enhancing its product's packaging design to attract more customers.
